Блятская поебень, которая мало того стоит хуеву тучу денег, за кусок гугла, ибо оперативка настолько умирает, что даже браузер с ума сходит (У меня 16гб).Лагает, багов хуева туча, сервера в жопе мира. Подведем итоги: Сегодня мы поняли что игра для окрепших Россией душ, не для ссаных малолеток которые ссутся сердцебиения когда приходит скала с топором. Вообщем моя оценка: АХУЕТЬ АХУЕНО НАХУЙ.

ERROR DESCONOCIDO

Como puede ser que este pesimamente optimizada el componente mas critico del juego, que es basicamente, jugar con amigos o directamente jugar alguna que otra partida. El juego funciona bien hasta que termina una partida y da "ERROR DESCONOCIDO" o en el Lobby esperando con amigos, y cuando encuentra partida te expulsa y dice "ERROR DESCONOCIDO", esto le pasa a muchisima gente y no lo arreglan nunca. 

Los desarrolladores estan haciendo algo de forma PESIMA que no pueden arreglar hace años ese error. MALISIMO!

- DIFICULDADE
🔲 Uma senhora de 90 anos completaria

🔲 Ruim

Only buy it if it's on sale.. Overall it's fun but this game is very buggy. You can easily get stuck on a tip of a cliff, or behind the hook and there's no way to unstuck yourself during a match. It's just unbelievable to me that it's been over 4 years since launch, and yet this simple "unplayable bug" exists in the game. Well, if Bethesda can get away with it then I guess so can they?

There are no benefits to playing as killer. The odds are stacked against you. The devs seem more worried about skins and themes than fixing broken mechanics. The fact that 2 individuals can unhook someone while taking NO damage is the equivalent to yelling timeout as a dodgeball flies at your face. This game practically encourages insanity, save your money, nerves, and time. This game belongs in the trash

As far as asymmetrical games go, this is really solid. The game is generally balanced around the killer getting 2 kills, and nothing feels particularly broken. If you get tired of playing one side, you can progress on the other. The only real downside I have about this game is the community at higher ranks can be very salty and nasty when things don't go their way, which can result in some mean and bitter post game chats.
The best part of the game is that the community at higher ranks can be very salty and nasty when things don't go their way, which results in some hilarious post-game chats.

Eu custei a jogar esse jogo porque tenho ansiedade e eu jurava que não ia ser legal ser perseguida por um maniaco com uma motosserra, bom, eu tava errada, a ansiedade não atacou e o maniaco da motosserra perseguiu mais os muros e pneus do que eu.
A comunidade é meio merda, mas hoje em dia poucas não são, então, ignora o chat e seja feliz. Quanto a tunnel, camp, slug, noed, piscar lanterna, dar t-bag e tantos outros mais, ta no jogo cara, se os dev colocaram e da pra usar, why not? É chato? Pra caralho, mas vida que segue, você xingar o killer/surv pq ele usou ou fez tal coisa não vai mudar em nada, sério, e não, não é motivo de ban, seja uma pessoa melhor, beijo no coração e acalma o cu.
O jogo é simples de entender, não tão fácil de jogar bem, mas a pratica leva a técnica ou qualquer coisa assim.

it's so bad that i wouldn't play a single game through even if my mom's life was on the line and crooks were pointing a 9mm at my head. even if it meant my dad would come back home. i'd literally cook and eat my dog before i even think to launch this virus on my poor pc. i'd rather have my hands cut off than sit through one match and experience worse hitboxes than a 1999 block tomb raider game recreated on mobile. i'd rather dive through the downtown city's slums shitty sewage system face first than sit through this generator simulator. i think my granddad's ghost wouldn't play this game even if it meant he could come back to life and ruin his family dynamic even more. save yourself the money and put it towards therapy if you've ever had the displeasure of experiencing the shitshow that is dead by daylight. i think this game gave me more mental issues than my own father did.

Even when sales go live they aren't doing anything as you still have to pay the same amount to get enough of the in game currency. The game itself is fun a decent chunk of the time, but the way things are priced is stupid. Only other gripe is the constant buggy nature of the game. Its always bugged to hell and back.

My friend recommended this game to me.
I tried to like it and at first it was kind of fun, but after a while you get matched up with experienced players and every game turns into "running in circles" aka looping. So as a killer you're just forced to run in circles to catch a survivor, which is breaking all immersion. As a survivor you have to learn this technique because there's not much else you can do. For some reason people find this mechanic fun, I guess.
The gameplay is very repetitive and predictable and there are plenty of ways to be toxic both as survivor or player, even though there is no chat during the game.
Oh, and matchmaking is garbage. As a new player you can get matched vs 4 premade top rank survivors, who will taunt you non-stop and who perfected their "looping" skill to a point where there is no sense chasing them.
I don't know how this game maintains a playerbase so long, it's super dull.

Do you have a full squad to play games? Get this game, Will you play solo or duo with a friend? Dont get this game.

[u]Pros[/u]
+ Fun playing survivor with friends
+ Nice amout of playable characters/monsters
+ The game is fun when you dont care about the toxic community
+ Fun for horror fans
+ A great way to make friends as killer in this game is to camp the hooked survivor

[u]Cons[/u]
- Unbalanced matchmaking
- Only play this game with your friends, otherwise it is boring
- No chat in match
- This game is for the killers, if you want to play as a survivor you not going to have fun at all.
- Do you like repairing generators? you are in luck because that the only thing you can do as survivor

Dead by Daylight. This game is absolutely shit- but in the best way possible. Its captivating game play mechanics along with its absolutely horrendous graphics make for an almost cancerous game. Despite this, it is absolutely addicting. Unless you spend months on end playing this game non-stop, there is almost no way to get burned out of it. After only 350h on record, I can already say that I have played this game enough to be a decently high rank, along with enough experience to loop the killer for a decent amount of time without getting hit. I can safely say that if you buy this game, you're practically selling your soul if this is a game you think you would remotely enjoy. Despite all of the reviews I've ever seen, (most of them being negative), I can firmly quote that this is a horrible, yet very addicting game. Once you start, you literally can't stop. This is at least my experience with the game.
